metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19274 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Passing an absolute path to a file_exists check in phpBB before 3.2.4 allows Remote Code Execution through Object Injection by employing Phar deserialization when an attacker has access to the Admin Control Panel with founder permissions. It was discovered that rkhunter is vulnerable to object injection vulnerability. An attacker could use it for remote code execution.

criterions.comment: phpbb3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
